name: Elon Must - Road to Respect
description: Help Elon Must make his way from Earth to Mars to pay respects to the deceased robot Opportunity.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 8 Processor: 1.7+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space
